attributes.action: Build a skatepark in: greenwich, charlton or blackheath.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like a skatepark to be built in greenwich,blackheath or charlton as we (being the people of these areas) lack the  ability to skate, bmx , roller skate or inline without having to travel to far locations.

rejection.details:
You should contact your local authority in the first instance.

Kind regards.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
